required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Drug-interaction Trial in Healthy Subjects With Oral Administration of Empagliflozin (BI 10773), Rifampicin and Probenecid
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomised, Open-label, Three-way Crossover Trial to Investigate the Effect of Rifampicin and Probenecid on Empagliflozin Pharmacokinetics in Healthy Male and Female Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The objectives of the trial are to investigate the effect of concurrent administration of rifampicin and probenecid on the pharmacokinetics of empagliflozin.

primary_outcome.measure: Total Empagliflozin: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 15 minutes (min) prior to the first dose and 20min, 40min, 1 hour (h), 1.5h, 2h, 2.5h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 36h, 48h and 72h after the first dose
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of total empagliflozin (empa) in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 15 minutes (min) prior to the first dose and 20min, 40min, 1 hour (h), 1.5h, 2h, 2.5h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 36h, 48h and 72h after the first dose
primary_outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of total empa in plasma, per period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Total Empagliflozin: Area Under the Curve 0 to Time of Last Quantifiable Data Point (AUC0-tz)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 15 minutes (min) prior to the first dose and 20min, 40min, 1 hour (h), 1.5h, 2h, 2.5h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 36h, 48h and 72h after the first dose
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of total empagliflozin (empa) in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to the time of last the quantifiable data point.

arm_group.description: Empagliflozin (BI 10773), Film-coated tablet, single dose, and Rifampicin,Film-coated tablet single dose
Empagliflozin (BI 10773), Film-coated tablet, single dose, and Probenecid Tablet twice daily

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
1. healthy male and female subjects
Exclusion criteria:
1. any relevant deviation from healthy conditions

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: This was a randomised, 3-way crossover trial. 18 patients were randomised to one of six treatment sequences and treated. It was an open label trial in which each treatment period lasted 4 days with a washout period of at least 7 days between each.

group.title: Empa Alone / Empa + Rifampicin / Empa + Probenecid
group.description: Patients were administered three treatments in the following order: Empa Alone (A single dose of 10mg of empagliflozin (empa)) Empa + Rifampicin (A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) combined with a single dose of 600 mg rifampicin) Empa + Probenecid (A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) in the morning of day 1 combined with 500 mg of probenecid given twice daily for four days from day -1 to day 3)

group.title: Empa Alone / Empa + Probenecid / Empa + Rifampicin
group.description: Patients were administered three treatments in the following order: Empa Alone (A single dose of 10mg of empagliflozin (empa)) Empa + Probenecid (A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) in the morning of day 1 combined with 500 mg of probenecid given twice daily for four days from day -1 to day 3) Empa + Rifampicin (A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) combined with a single dose of 600 mg rifampicin)

group.title: Empa + Rifampicin / Empa Alone / Empa + Probenecid
group.description: Patients were administered three treatments in the following order: Empa + Rifampicin (A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) combined with a single dose of 600 mg rifampicin) Empa Alone (A single dose of 10mg of empagliflozin (empa)) Empa + Probenecid (A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) in the morning of day 1 combined with 500 mg of probenecid given twice daily for four days from day -1 to day 3)

group.title: Empa + Rifampicin / Empa + Probenecid / Empa Alone
group.description: Patients were administered three treatments in the following order: Empa + Rifampicin (A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) combined with a single dose of 600 mg rifampicin) Empa + Probenecid (A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) in the morning of day 1 combined with 500 mg of probenecid given twice daily for four days from day -1 to day 3) Empa Alone (A single dose of 10mg of empagliflozin (empa))

group.title: Empa + Probenecid / Empa Alone / Empa + Rifampicin
group.description: Patients were administered three treatments in the following order: Empa + Probenecid (A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) in the morning of day 1 combined with 500 mg of probenecid given twice daily for four days from day -1 to day 3) Empa Alone (A single dose of 10mg of empagliflozin (empa)) Empa + Rifampicin (A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) combined with a single dose of 600 mg rifampicin)

group.title: Empa + Probenecid / Empa + Rifampicin / Empa Alone
group.description: Patients were administered three treatments in the following order: Empa + Probenecid (A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) in the morning of day 1 combined with 500 mg of probenecid given twice daily for four days from day -1 to day 3) Empa + Rifampicin (A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) combined with a single dose of 600 mg rifampicin) Empa Alone (A single dose of 10mg of empagliflozin (empa))

baseline.population: Treated Set. Total number of patients randomised and treated in the study.

group.title: Study Overall
group.description: This was a randomised, 3-way crossover trial. 18 patients were randomised to one of six treatment sequences and treated. It was an open label trial in which each treatment period lasted 4 days with a washout period of at least 7 days between each.

outcome.title: Total Empagliflozin: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of total empagliflozin (empa) in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity.
outcome.time_frame: 15 minutes (min) prior to the first dose and 20min, 40min, 1 hour (h), 1.5h, 2h, 2.5h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 36h, 48h and 72h after the first dose
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic (PK) set: The PK analysis set includes all subjects who took at least 1 dose of investigational treatment and provided at least 1 evaluable observation for at least 1 primary PK endpoint in at least 1 treatment period without any important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation of PK.

group.title: Empa Alone
group.description: A single dose of 10mg of empagliflozin (empa).

group.title: Empa + Rifampicin
group.description: A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) combined with a single dose of 600 mg rifampicin.

group.title: Empa + Probenecid
group.description: A single dose of 10mg empagliflozin (empa) in the morning of day 1 combined with 500 mg of probenecid given twice daily for four days from day -1 to day 3.

measure.title: Total Empagliflozin: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
measure.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of total empagliflozin (empa) in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity.
measure.population: Pharmacokinetic (PK) set: The PK analysis set includes all subjects who took at least 1 dose of investigational treatment and provided at least 1 evaluable observation for at least 1 primary PK endpoint in at least 1 treatment period without any important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation of PK.

analysis.non_inferiority_desc: Ratio calculated as empa and rifampicin divided by empa
analysis.estimate_desc: Standard deviation is actually the intra-subject coefficient of variation.

analysis.non_inferiority_desc: Ratio calculated as empa plus probenecid divided by empa
analysis.estimate_desc: Standard deviation is actually the intra-subject coefficient of variation.

outcome.title: Total Empa: Maximum Measured Concentration (Cmax)
outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of total empa in plasma, per period.
outcome.time_frame: 15 minutes (min) prior to the first dose and 20min, 40min, 1 hour (h), 1.5h, 2h, 2.5h, 3h, 4h, 6h, 8h, 12h, 24h, 36h, 48h and 72h after the first dose
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic (PK) set: The PK analysis set includes all subjects who took at least 1 dose of investigational treatment and provided at least 1 evaluable observation for at least 1 primary PK endpoint in at least 1 treatment period without any important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation of PK.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Any publication of the result of this trial must be consistent with the Boehringer Ingelheim publication policy. The rights of the investigator and of the sponsor with regard to publication of the results of this trial are described in the investigator contract.
